string.text: I need your help eliminating a few mutants. Here are the coordinates.
The butcher has asked me to bring him %s.
Some people pay good money for mutant meat.
You want to earn some money? The meat of mutants is highly valued among a few 'narrow circles'... Best not to go into detail - I'd just like you to find some %s. What do you say?
Some fine chow you've gathered. Well done, hunter.
The trader at the flea market wants me to find a %s.
You want to earn some loot looking for artefacts of the less common variety? I can offer you some good equipment.
Feel like earning some loot while looking for rare artefacts? For a "%s", I can offer you some more stuff.
Ah, great work, stalker. Here, for you.
